alert.note: Alert for Barbour; Harrison; Lewis; Randolph; Taylor; Upshur (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 28 at 4:14PM EDT until July 28 at 5:00PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: The National Weather Service in Charleston West Virginia has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Randolph County in northeastern West Virginia... Taylor County in northern West Virginia... East central Lewis County in northern West Virginia... Northern Upshur County in northeastern West Virginia... Barbour County in northeastern West Virginia... Eastern Harrison County in northern West Virginia... * Until 500 PM EDT. * At 414 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles northwest of Lumberport to near Nutter Fort to near Weston, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Clarksburg, Elkins, Buckhannon, Grafton, Philippi, Audra State Park, Bridgeport, Shinnston, Belington, Stonewood, Nutter Fort, Anmoore, Enterprise, Junior, Flemington, Womelsdorf (Coalton), Montrose, Knottsville, Meadland, and Tygart Lake State Park. This includes the following highways... Interstate 79 between mile markers 113 and 128. Route 50 in West Virginia between mile markers 81 and 82. Route 33 between mile markers 7 and 35. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Barbour; Harrison; Lewis; Randolph; Taylor; Upshur
